summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear implemented: the reveal button now uses a pink palette (default/hover/active) and the label text matches exactly. Some additional non-requested changes were made (e.g., global font/title/config updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated global font setup (Poppins) and/or added font-related configuration beyond the specific button styling/text change request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the additional reveal button color styling and its label text; font changes are not requested.
BuildRequest did not request changing the document/page title.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added Tailwind theme color mappings for a pink color group (pink.DEFAULT/hover/active).
hallucinated_features.reason: While it supports the button change, the BuildRequest only specifies updating the button styling; adding new theme-level tokens is an implementation addition not explicitly requested.
BuildRequest did not request changes to project_state.json.
